ValueSet-IMMZD18SBCGVS.title: IMMZD18SBCG ValueSet for Decision Table Schema
ValueSet-IMMZD18SBCGVS.description: JSON Schema for IMMZD18SBCG ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
enum: http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#One BCG dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed-89
ValueSet-IMMZD18SBCGVS.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the IMMZD18SBCG ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/immunizations/ValueSet-IMMZD18SBCGVS.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
